## BinaryHeap.from() method

Creates a new, shallow-copied binary heap instance from an array-like or iterable object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static from<T>(arrayLike: Iterable<T>): BinaryHeap<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  arrayLike | Iterable&lt;T&gt; | An array-like or iterable object to convert to an binary heap. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[BinaryHeap](./calcium.binaryheap.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;
